import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{fetchReviews,fetchMockReviews}from'../services/api';// Combined API service
import'./Reviews.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Reviews=()=>{const[reviews,setReviews]=useState([]);const[error,setError]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const getReviews=async()=>{const token=localStorage.getItem('token');try{const reviewsData=await fetchReviews(token);setReviews(reviewsData);}catch(err){console.error("Failed to fetch reviews from API:",err);setError("Loading mock data...");try{const mockReviewsData=await fetchMockReviews();setReviews(mockReviewsData);}catch(mockErr){console.error("Failed to fetch mock reviews:",mockErr);setError("Failed to load mock data.");}}};getReviews();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"reviews-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Your Reviews"}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"error-message",children:error}),reviews.map(review=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"review-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:review.author}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Rating: ",review.rating]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:review.comment})]},review.id))]});};export default Reviews;
